TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ToolboxBitmapAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 这使您可以指定一个图标来表示容器的控件，例如 Microsoft Visual Studio 窗体设计器。

span.span: Allows you to specify an icon to represent a control in a container, such as the Microsoft Visual Studio Form Designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将应用到控件，以便容器，如 Microsoft Visual Studio 窗体设计器中，可以检索一个图标，表示的控件。You can apply a to a control so that containers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio Form Designer, can retrieve an icon that represents the control. 图标位图可存在于一个文件中单独或嵌入到程序集中包含该控件。The bitmap for the icon can be in a file by itself or embedded in the assembly that contains the control. 用于在中嵌入的位图大小控件的程序集 （或在单独的文件的存储区） 应为 16 × 16。The size of the bitmap that you embed in the control's assembly (or store in a separate file) should be 16 by 16. 方法对象能否返回 16x16 小型图像或它通过缩放小图像创建 32x32 大型图像。The method of a object can return the small 16 by 16 image or a large 32 by 32 image that it creates by scaling the small image. 若要将其他版本的图标用于不同版本的程序集，您无需修改每个版本的 。If you want to use different versions of your icons with different versions of your assembly, you do not have to modify the for each version. 相反，您可使用 或 声明此程集，并为每个程序集版本指定一个 配置值。Instead, you can declare the assembly with a or a , and specify a configuration value for each assembly version. 在此情况下，使用追加的位图后缀来解释由 表示的文件名。In this case, a file name indicated by a is interpreted with the bitmap suffix appended. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来设置`stop.bmp`为的工具箱图标`StopSignControl`。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to set `stop.bmp` as the toolbox icon for the `StopSignControl`. 此示例假定名为 16 \*-16 像素的位图是否存在`stop.bmp`在 c:\\。This example assumes the existence of a 16-by-16-pixel bitmap named `stop.bmp` at c:\\. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/cpp/usercontrol1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/CS/usercontrol1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/VB/usercontrol1.vb#1)]

[!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/cpp/usercontrol1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/CS/usercontrol1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/VB/usercontrol1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数搜索中定义由指定的类型的程序集的嵌入资源`t`参数。This constructor searches for an embedded resource in the assembly that defines the type specified by the `t` parameter. 构造函数搜索的资源名称为的 namespace.classname.bmp，其中命名空间是命名空间包含指定的类的定义`t`参数。The constructor searches for a resource named namespace.classname.bmp, where namespace is the namespace containing the definition of the class specified by the `t` parameter. 例如，如果控件处于 NamespaceA AssemblyA.dll 中，则构造函数搜索 AssemblyA.dll 一个名为 NamespaceA.ControlA.bmp 资源。For example, if ControlA is in NamespaceA in AssemblyA.dll, then the constructor searches AssemblyA.dll for a resource named NamespaceA.ControlA.bmp. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数来设置为工具箱图标的按钮控件的图标名为`StopSignControl3`。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to set the icon of the button control to the toolbox icon for a named `StopSignControl3`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数搜索中定义由指定的类型的程序集的嵌入资源`t`参数。This constructor searches for an embedded resource in the assembly that defines the type specified by the `t` parameter. 此构造函数搜索名为 namespace.name 的资源，其中 namespace 是包含由 `t` 参数指定的类的定义的命名空间。The constructor searches for a resource named namespace.name, where namespace is the namespace containing the definition of the class specified by the `t` parameter. 例如，假设到控件是在 AssemblyA.dll NamespaceA 中的类，且传递"MyBitmap.bmp"`name`参数。For example, suppose that ControlA is a class in NamespaceA in AssemblyA.dll and that you passed "MyBitmap.bmp" to the `name` parameter. 则构造函数搜索资源名称为 NamespaceA.MyBitmap.bmp AssemblyA.dll。Then the constructor searches AssemblyA.dll for a resource named NamespaceA.MyBitmap.bmp. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数来设置`StopSignControl2.bmp`作为的工具箱图标`StopSignControl2`。'The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to set `StopSignControl2.bmp` as a toolbox icon for the `StopSignControl2`. 此示例假定名为 16 \*-16 像素的位图是否存在`StopSignControl2.bmp`与其**BuildAction**属性设置为**EmbeddedResource**。This example assumes the existence of a 16-by-16-pixel bitmap named `StopSignControl2.bmp` with its **BuildAction** property set to **EmbeddedResource**. param.name: t
param.span: 此方法在定义由 t 参数指定的类型的程序集中搜索嵌入的位图资源。

span.span: This method searches for an embedded bitmap resource in the assembly that defines the type specified by the t parameter.

param.span: 例如，如果将 typeof(ControlA) 传递给 t 参数，则此方法在定义 ControlA 的程序集中搜索。

span.span: For example, if you pass typeof(ControlA) to the t parameter, then this method searches the assembly that defines ControlA.

param.span: 嵌入的位图资源的名称。

span.span: The name of the embedded bitmap resource.

param.name: large
param.span: 指定此方法是返回大图像（真）还是小图像（假）。

span.span: Specifies whether this method returns a large image (true)or a small image (false).

param.span: 小图像为 16 × 16，而大图像为 32 × 32。

span.span: The small image is 16 by 16, and the large image is 32 x 32.

summary.span: 基于程序集中嵌入的位图资源返回 对象。

span.span: Returns an object based on a bitmap resource that is embedded in an assembly.

returns.span: 基于检索到的位图的 对象。

span.span: An object based on the retrieved bitmap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法搜索资源名称为的 namespace.imgName，其中命名空间是命名空间包含由指定的类型的定义`t`参数。This method searches for a resource named namespace.imgName, where namespace is the namespace containing the definition of the type specified by the `t` parameter. 例如，假设将传递到 typeof(ControlA)`t`参数，并将"MyBitmap.bmp"传递给 imgName 参数。For example, suppose you pass typeof(ControlA) to the `t` parameter and you pass "MyBitmap.bmp" to the imgName parameter. 如果控件处于 NamespaceA AssemblyA.dll 中，此方法对资源名称为 NamespaceA.MyBitmap.bmp 搜索 AssemblyA.dll。If ControlA is in NamespaceA in AssemblyA.dll, then this method searches AssemblyA.dll for a resource named NamespaceA.MyBitmap.bmp. 此方法用于检索嵌入到程序集中的 16 x 16 位图资源。This method is intended to retrieve a 16 x 16 bitmap resource that is embedded in an assembly. 但是，没有任何要求，即嵌入的位图的大小为 16 x 16。However, there is no requirement that the embedded bitmap has a size of 16 x 16. 用于检索从 （无论何种大小） 的程序集中的位图被视为小图像。The bitmap that is retrieved from the assembly (no matter what size) is considered the small image. 大型映像创建的缩放大小为 32 x 32"小"的图像。The large image is created by scaling the "small" image to a size of 32 x 32. 因此，大的图像将始终是 32 × 32，而不考虑的程序集中检索到的位图的大小。So the large image will always be 32 by 32, regardless of the size of the bitmap retrieved from the assembly.
